channel.title: Project Insanity Shops & Objects
channel.description:
Many know im not the greatest PI Coder..
Not sure how to sign a shop to a certain npc, and also how do i add/delete objects? :s
Help is appretiated.

item.title: Project Insanity Shops & Objects
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

well evil is mostly right but its a -1 not a 1. And to make a npc open a certain shop head to actionhandler.java. (src/server/model/players)

and scroll down to either 1st click npc or 2nd click npc.

If you code under 1st click the shop will be opened when you click talk to the npcs name.

if you code under 2nd click the shop will open when you click trade.

search either first or second.

then add something like this:

case NPCID:
c.getPA().openShop(shopId);
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity Shops & Objects
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i am a noob at codding but im trying my best to get better. so… im gunna try this.

1st go to your source and search objectmanajer
src>server>wrold>objectmanager.java

Search

c.getPA().
that should bring you to alot of corddinates and things like
(1, ####, ####, 1, 10)
u find the id and coords of the object you wish to delete and you find the coords which match the line and just delete it and compile. I hope this works. Again this is literally my first time doing anyhting like a tutorial. :D

Read full topic
